Jim Morris
==========

Jim Morris, Council Place 3
---------------------------

![Jim Morris_Headshot_ June 2025](https://www.huttotx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6022)

[Email Jim Morris](mailto:%20Jim.Morris@HuttoTX.gov)

elected to City Council Place 3 on June 7th, 2025. A Hutto resident since 2008, having grown up in North Austin. Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering and Master of Science in Engineering UT Austin; retired Semiconductor Process Technology Engineer.

After years of volunteering with the CoHutto Boards and Commissions,
sought a new level of dedication as a CouncilMember to sustain and improve the Quality of Life for Hutto. As an Elected Official, CouncilMember
prides himself on being a representative of all residents; within the city limits, working within the ETJ and working with the Hutto ISD.




### Contact Us

   512-759-4015
